Template.Name: Thriftly API Project
Template.LongDescription:
Creates a Thriftly Application.
Thriftly is used to build JSON-RPC, SOAP, and Thrift based API services.
Included is the ability to test your API with our Thriftly Gateway service for free. This service instantly publishes your API securely onto the internet with no setup!

Template.Name: Thriftly API Service
Template.LongDescription: Creates a service for use in an Thriftly Application.
